content: I don't have access to real-time sports updates and news. however, it's common for baseball teams to make changes to their strategies during the playoffs, as strategies have to be adaptable and fluid to win baseball games. teams may make adjustments to their batting lineup, pitching strategies, and defensive schemes to account for the strengths and weaknesses of their opponents. furthermore, teams may employ different strategies based on the game situation and circumstances, such as playing small ball or going for a home run in specific situations. ultimately, the team's strategy will depend on a variety of factors and will evolve throughout the course of the playoffs.
